org.activebpel.rt.xml
Class AeXMLToSimpleString

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      org.activebpel.rt.xml.AeXMLToSimpleString
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class AeXMLToSimpleString
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler

This class extends the SAX DefaultHandler and is used to extract the core XML from an input stream. todo This now sorts the attributes to ensure different parsers produce the same simple string, v1.0 didn't sort, so awf needs this newer version when running debug.

Method Detail

extractCoreXML

public static java.lang.String extractCoreXML(java.io.InputStream aInput,
                                              boolean aTrimWhitespace)
This method takes as input a stream which represents an XML document, and extracts the core tags, attributes and data. All unnecessary whitespace and comments are removed, based on flag passed in. This method is useful in preparing XML documents for comparison.

Parameters:
aInput - the input stream representing an XML document
aTrimWhitespace - True to trim whitespace False to preserve

extractCoreXML

public static java.lang.String extractCoreXML(org.xml.sax.InputSource aInputSource,
                                              boolean aTrimWhitespace)
This method takes as input a inputsource which represents an XML document, and extracts the core tags, attributes and data. All unnecessary whitespace and comments are removed, based on flag passed in. This method is useful in preparing XML documents for comparison.

Parameters:
aInputSource - the input stream representing an XML document
aTrimWhitespace - True to trim whitespace False to preserve

Handles creation of element tag and any attributes as well as namespace declarations it contains. Note the attributes and namespaces are sorted to ensure the comparisons are successful.
